Walker Solutions Walker + Qualtrics

CX Recognition

Walker Named CX Partner of the Year

At the recent Qualtrics X4 Summit, Walker was recognized as a top partner in the Qualtrics Partner Network.

Learn more about Walker activities at X4 

Featured Insights

  • CX Leader Podcast Series: Luminaries of CX
  • CX Advantage Blog CX: DIY or Bust?
  • Report Accelerating The CX Advantage
  • DEVELOP EXPERIENCE STRATEGIES
  • UNDERSTAND CUSTOMERS & EMPLOYEES
  • DRIVE ACTION & RESULTS
  • TECHNOLOGY TO ACCELERATE

UNMATCHED TECHNOLOGY MEETS WORLD-CLASS SERVICE

Walker and Qualtrics have teamed up to bring you the best of both worlds: industry-leading experience management technology plus world-class professional services. As a founding member of the Qualtrics Partner Network, Walker delivers flawless platform implementation, custom technology services, flexible CX programs and expert advisory services – all to accelerate your success.

Learn More

Featured Case Study

Driving Greater Retention Using Operational Metrics

To maintain industry leadership, Belden put the customer voice at the center of its priorities. After working with Walker to make improvements, Belden is now more able to effectively sense operational changes that are likely to impact retention and intervene – and loyalty is up 6 percent.
